definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: shape, create (cf. Ar. baray, form, fashion by cutting, shape out, pare a reed for writing, a stick for an arrow, but also barao;a, create; Ph. [[הברא]] CIS:i. 347 incisor, a trade involving cutting; As. barû, make, create, COT:Gloss & Hpt KAT:2 Gloss 1 but dub.; Sab. [[ברא]] found, build, DHM:ZMG 1883, 413, synon. [[בנה]]; Ba:ZA. 1888, 58, comp. As. banû, create, beget, with change of liquid; Aram. [[בְּרָא]], bro0, create)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. Ge 1:1 + 19 t.; Impf. [[יִבְרָא]] Ge 1:21, Ge 1:27, Nu 16:30; Inf. [[בְּראׁ]] Ge 5:1; Imv. [[בְּרָא]] Ps 51:12; Pt. [[בּוֹרֵא]] Is 42:5 + 10 t.; sf. [[בּׂרַאֲךָ]] Is 43:1; [[בּוֹרְאֶיךָ]] Ec 12:1; —shape, fashion, create, always of divine activity, with acc. rei, seldom except in P and Is:Is 2.

obj. heaven and earth Ge 1:1, Ge 2:3 (P) Is 45:18, Is 45:18; mankind Ge 1:27, Ge 1:27, Ge 1:27, Ge 5:1, Ge 5:2 (P) Ge 6:7 (J) De 4:32, Ps 89:48, Is 45:12; the host of heaven Is 40:26; heavens Is 42:5; ends of the earth Is 40:28; north and south Ps 89:13; wind Am 4:13; the [[תנינים]] Ge 1:21 (P).
the individual man Mal 2:10 (‖ father) Ec 12:1; the smith and the waster Is 54:16, Is 54:16; Israel as a nation Is 43:15; Jacob Is 43:1; the seed of Israel Is 43:7.

new conditions and circumstances: righteousness and salvation Is 45:8; darkness and evil Is 45:7; fruit of the lips Is 57:19; a new thing [[חֲדָשָׁה]] (a woman encompassing a man) Je 31:22; [[בְּרִיאָה]] (swallowing up the Korahites) Nu 16:30 (J); cloud and flame over Zion Is 4:5.

of transformations: a clean heart Ps 51:12 (‖[[חִדֵּשׁ]]); new heaven and earth Is 65:17 (in place of old); transformation of nature Is 41:20; with double acc. [[בורא ירושׁלם גילה]] transform Jerusalem into rejoicing Is 65:18.
be created: heaven and earth Ge 2:4 (P); creatures Ps 104:30; mankind Ge 5:2 (P); heavens Ps 148:5.

with reference to birth: [[במקום אשׁר נבראת]] in the place where thou wast created (i.e. native land) Ez Eze 21:30; [[יום הבראך]] day when thou wast created (king of Tyre) Ez Eze 28:13, Eze 28:15 (cf. [[היום ילדתיך]] Ps 2:7); [[עַם נִבְרָא]] Ps 102:19 (‖[[עַם נוֹלָד]] Ps 22:32).
of something new, astonishing: miracles Ex 34:10 (J); new things, [[חדשׁות]] Is 48:6.
cut down: a forest Jos 17:15, Jos 17:18 (J); [[וּבָרֵא אוֹתְהֶן בְּחַרְבוֹתָם]] Ez Eze 23:47.
cut out: [[יׇד]] hand, as an index Ez Eze 21:24, Eze 21:24.
